name: Kir Kanos
Lore: 'Fiercely devoted Royal Guard. Feels deeply indebted to those who risk their life for him. Unaware of the extent of Palpatine''s atrocities and cruelty.',
Text: 'When armed with a Force pike, adds one battle destiny. Once during each of your deploy phases, lose 1 Force or place Kanos and cards deployed on him in owner''s Used Pile (if Emperor on table, may use 1 Force instead).',
